timeline.bodyText:
Will not_implemented_method work here? It's wrapper takes a self parameter:

  
    
      beam/sdks/python/apache_beam/dataframe/frame_base.py
    
    
         Line 317
      in
      174d2b6
    
    
    
    

        
          
           def wrapper(self, *args, **kwargs):
timeline.author: TheNeuralBit
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -131,6 +131,11 @@ def _binary_writer(format):
 read_hdf = to_hdf = frame_base.wont_implement_method('random access files')
 
 
+for name in dir(pd):
+  if name.startswith('read_') and name not in globals():
+    globals()[name] = frame_base.not_implemented_method(name)

replies.bodyText: Good point. Updated to not require self.
replies.author: robertwb

timeline.message: Allow not/won't imlement helpers to be used for functions as well as methods.
Allow not/won't imlement helpers to be used for functions as well as methods.
